content: this vintage inspired vest features classic granny squares and an on-trend design comfy as can be the alpaca blend yarn is both soft and warm while the hood will keep you perfectly cozy an awesome layering piece for fall and winter alike materials us size i 5 25 hook 5 5 6 6 7 skeins lion brand touch of alpaca yarn in black 100g kit available in four color options here 1 skein lion brand touch of alpaca yarn in taupe 100 g pattern uses approximately 417g 465 g 509 g 556 g 603 g scissors tapestry needle skill level easy + sizes five sizes available small medium large xl xxl
